alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 1:50PM MST until May 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts from 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Much of northern and central Arizona, except for the lower elevations of Yavapai and northern Gila counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust and/or sand possible north of the Mogollon Rim.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
